original_text: Some Pharisees came to Jesus. They wanted to find out how he would answer their question. They asked him, ‘Can a man send his wife away, so that she is no longer his wife? Is it right for him to do that?’
korean_text: 바리새인들이 예수께 나아와 그를 시험하여 묻되 사람이 아내를 버리는 것이 옳으니이까

sentences.original_text: how he would answer their question.
Can a man send his wife away,
sentences.korean_translation: 한 남자가 자기 아내를 내보낼 수 있는가,

sentences.original_text: so that she is no longer his wife?
sentences.korean_translation: 그래서 그녀가 더 이상 그의 아내가 아닌가?

sentences.original_text: Is it right for him to do that?
